item.title: King Ultimate Rework
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
I hate allies too, mind you. But unless you have a miracle problem which hasn’t been done before, feel free to share.

What about a tribute-like ability, where King can transfer uses of limited-use abilities from one player (with their permission) to another?

This would be beneficial to all King’s regardless of faction, although maybe not to the extent necessary. The donors & recipients would decide exactly which ability to tribute / receive a use of. So that nobody but the player themselves would know whether the tribute use was a day, night, good, or evil ability.

Or how about:

Census (Night Ability - 2 uses): Learn the number of living Blue Dragon players.

Or even something crazy like, delete Mystic and give “Link Minds” to King.

item.title: King Ultimate Rework
item.dc:creator: invoker
item.description:
The King

Blue Dragon Special
Royal Finger (Passive) - All nominations of treason count as 2, unless King used decide fate. If possessed the possessor will keep this passive, for as long as they are in your body.
Tenacity (Passive) - Occupy and redirect immune.Can talk at any point of the trial.
Decide Fate (Day) - Decide an accused player’s fate. - 1 use
Execute! (Night) - Attack a player. The attacked player will receive the message “The King’s Guard’s Attacked you last night”, starter king only. - 2 uses
Guard (Night) - Become death immune tonight - 2 uses
Defeat the Unseen or Cult and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.

The Evil King

Unseen Special
Royal Finger (Passive) - All nominations of treason count as 2, unless King used decide fate. If possessed the possessor will keep this passive, for as long as they are in your body.
Tenacity (Passive) - Occupy and redirect immune.Can talk at any point of the trial.
Allies (Day) - Learn at the end of the night if the player is a member of the cult/unseen. You may not use Execute! tonight, only starter evil king. - 2 uses
Decide fate (Day) - Decide an accused player’s fate - 1 use
Execute! (Night) - Attack a player. The attacked player will receive the message"The King’s Guard’s Attacked you last night", starter king only - 2 uses
Guards (Night) - Become death immune tonight - 2 uses
Defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.

Possible Ideas

  • Only Starter king has Royal Finger
  • If Distracted Royal Finger is negated
